sentence.Network_en: Ichiro Suzuki was born in Aichi Prefecture, Japan, on October 22, 1973.

sentence.Network_en: Hello. This is Ichiro Aoki of X Company.

sentence.Network_en: The first is the role of Ichiro Ozawa , the Svengali - like figure who mischievously behind Mr Hatoyama.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一,小泽一郎扮演的角色使人不安,他是一个斯文加利式人物,在鸠山背后虎视眈眈.
